name: Fringe81, Inc.
overview:
Fringe81 is the ad-technology company that provides internet ad-technology in all their development.

Their most futured service is the creative optimization service “Žiogous” which was published in May 2010. “Žiogous” is entirely new concept of auto-generated advertising delivery platform that can improve the CTR of banner ads by learning and accumulating enormous amount of data such as catch copies and main visuals by using the technology of creative optimization that was all developed by Fringe81. It enables data analysis of banner ads that has been relied on experience and intuition.

They also expand RSS advertising business, Twitterbanner business, and social application business besides the creative optimaization business.

RSS ads, Inc. the Fringe81 predecessor company was founded in April 2005. They have provided services to many clients as the world’s leading RSS advertising business company. Their mission is to create new internet businesses and to keep delivering the services to global customers. They will keep providing valuable technologies to the clients as the world’s leading ad-technology company.
